showScoreExcerpt:
The collective humanity of the characters is wonderfully embellished by Jason Howland’s brilliant score, which draws on musical roots of both Irish and African cultures. The beauty of the show’s unapologetic slice of life framework is that while each character has moments in the spotlight, the interconnectedness of their community pulsates through every word, every chord, every moment. The structure of Paradise Square is an integral part of the meaning-- we all deserve to live on our own terms.
